div.bibl: Die Abendpost, Jan. 21, 1890. [THE WALDHEIM CEMETERY SOCIETY]

body.p: The Waldheim-Friedhof-Gesellschaft (The Forest Home-Cemetery Company) The members of the above enterprise held their annual meeting yesterday, at Niehoff's hall. The statements of the officials show, that $15,000,00 have been expended for the laying of drainage tile, for maintenance and beautifying of paths. The dividend per bond amounts to .60Â¢. The new election of officials and advisory-Board gave the following results: Phil Maas, President; Jacob Heissler, V. President; John Buehler, Secretary; John M. Faulhafer, Treasurer and eleven members elected to the Board.
